summary:
Various NPC clones not allowed to be followers, now you can have them.
They are all marriable followers.
Added at the moment: Katria (as ghost),Gormlaith Golden-Hilt, Maven and Ingun Black-Briar, Astrid, Vex, Elenwen, 2 variations of serana, Valerica, Svana Fair-Shield, Haelga, Ahlam, Irileth, Olfina, mirabelle, katria, arnbjorn...
descriptionHtml:
I will not add pictures or info about the original NPC to prevent spoilers.
I recommend using Fus Ro Doh mod, in order to see some dialogs with missing voice in the game. It will help you so much that you will not want to play without it.


[size=5][font=Tahoma][color=RED]DESCRIPTION:[/color][/font][/size]
For various reasons, some NPCS can not be followers, or they are so awesome that only one of them its not enough... Well, not anymore.
"Special" npcs usually have unique voices wich dont have the marriage/follower dialogues, so i changed their voice to the most similar available.
No custom skeleton, or faces, it will be the one you have installed (or the default vanilla one if none are installed. if you dont know what im talking about, you probably have none installed, so dont worry mod will work perfectly with you as well)
All of them are marriable, can be followers and they are protected (only the player can kill them).
They all start at level 10-25 and will level with you till 81, and some of them till level 200.
No grey face bug, fixed on all of them.
The number of plugins was increasing alarmingly, so they are now separated in groups by holds, to save plugin slots.

[b][u]The rift:[/u][/b]
-[color=yellow]Maven Black-Briar[/color] clone, Maren, located in Four shields Inn, Dragon Bridge.
-[color=yellow]Ingun Black-Briar[/color] clone, Ingum, located in Four shields Inn, Dragon Bridge
-[color=yellow]Svana[/color] Fair Shield expanded stamina pool. Located in Haelga´s Bunkhouse.
-[color=yellow]Haelga[/color]. Expanded mana pool. Located in Haelga´s Bunkhouse.
-[color=yellow]Vex[/color] clone, Vexy, located in the bee and barb in riften (usually upstairs) - increased light armor and one handed ability.

[b][u]Winterhold:[/u][/b]
-[color=yellow]Elenwen´s[/color] clone, Elanwen, located in the bee and barb in riften (usually upstairs) -increased magic pool.
[color=yellow]-Mirabelle Ervine[/color] clone, roaming the college.

[b][u]Whiterun Hold:[/u][/b]
[color=yellow]-Ahlam[/color] clone, Nahlam. Can be found patrolling Whiterun.
[color=yellow]-Irileth[/color] clone, Xirileth. Can be found patrolling Whiterun.
[color=yellow]-Olfina[/color] clone, Olfeena.Can be found patrolling Whiterun.
[color=yellow]-Adrianne Avenicci[/color] clone, roaming Whiterun.

[b][u]Others in special groups:[/u][/b]
-[color=yellow]Gormlaith Golden-Hilt[/color] clone, Garmlaith, located in Four shields Inn, Dragon Bridge. Increased health and stamina.
-[color=yellow]Astrid´s[/color] clone, Samaniel, located in whiterun´s bannered mare.
-[color=yellow]Serana´s[/color] clone, Sanara located in Whiterun´s Bannered Mare.She is a vampire. I increased her weight slider and added more stamina. Vampire.
Has different hair, REQUIRES APACHII HAIR main mod or game will CTD.REQUIRES DAWNGUARD INSTALLED.
-[color=yellow]Serana´s[/color] sister sanara, (already a lot of serana mods so i customized this one) Has different hair (standalone, no other mods needed) and size. Expanded mana pool. Vampire. Located outside Castle Volkihar.
-[color=yellow]Serana´s [/color]cousin, Leelu (yes i like serana a lot)
-[color=yellow]Valerica´s [/color] twin sister Valentia. Vampire. Located outside Castle Volkihar.
[color=yellow]-Katria[/color] clone, as ghost. Can be found around the place where the original katria´s quest finishes. 
[color=yellow]-Arnbjorn[/color] clone located in Dead Mans drink falkreath


[size=5][font=Tahoma][color=RED]INSTALLATION:[/color][/font][/size]
If Nexus mod manager asks for update say NO, and if it asks to overwrite say YES.


[size=5][font=Tahoma][color=RED]UPDATING[/color][/font][/size]
If updating to 2.0 from previous versions, i recommend deleting the npcs from mods like MHYH, AFT, EFF, and any mod that alters and saves the NPC prior to updating, then make a clean save, and finally installing the new version.


[size=5][font=Tahoma][color=yellow]To-do list:
[/color][/font][/size]-[s]Pack them by locations from now on [/s]
-[s]merge all in one or copy to new version the old ones [/s]
-Anska
-more npcs coming! tell me wich ones do you want.


Credits
Thanks to apachii for the hair. Such a wonderful work, check it out!----->[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]



[center][size=4][font=Tahoma][color=Blue]Do you like my work? take a look at my other mods:[/color][/font][/size]
[color=BLUE][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51536/?]Npc clones - Follower and marry[/url][/color]
[color=BLUE][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52065/?]Children Followers -FULLY VOICED- they fight -pickpocketable-[/url][/color]
[color=BLUE][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51535/?]Multiple Marriages-Spouse Dress Up-SPANISH VOICES- version 121[/url][/color]
[color=BLUE][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51287/?]Teleport to and between all player homes and mark-recall locations[/url][/color]
[color=BLUE][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51711/?]Enhanced Ebony Blade - the true promised daedric weapon - NO SCRIPTS[/url][/color][/center]
author: cotoli

files.name: NPC clones - Follower and marry
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed sandbox for MIrabelle Ervine,Nahlam, Olfeena and Xirileth
Fixed grey face bug for MIrabelle Ervine,Nahlam, Olfeena and Xirileth

files.name: NPC Clones - Follower and Marry
files.changelogHtml:
merged them by groups to reduce plugin slots
added adrianne avenicci
added arnbjorn
fixed ingum, maren, svana, haelga sandbox
fixed samaniel not leveling and sandbox
